description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Y4ajp13ACVnzaS5s]{Drone Chassis}

Often built to resemble a sapient species, the protocol drone is an adept translator and negotiator programmed to sense and adapt to a wide variety of social situations and domestic tasks.

Initial Mods

Linguistic Module (Ex)

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.A8EizEg8WZh7t2wq]{Manipulator Arms (Ex)}

Negotiator Protocol (Ex)

Bonus Skill Unit

Culture, plus either Bluff, Diplomacy, Intimidate, or Sense Motive @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.6cm9UHSlmWPU9QQe]{Skill Unit (Ex)}

The negotiator protocol mod must be added to the sheet for the ability scores to match the statblock in TR pg. 25
